About the Chamber
=================

The mission of the Haskell Chamber of Commerce and Visitor Center is: To promote the Haskell area for the continuation and perpetual increase of trade, hunting, fishing, commercial and agricultural interests.

To promote tourism; advance economic development; provide leadership and positive attitude through community involvement; thereby benefiting the Chamber’s membership and all residents of the Haskell area.

**Chamber of Commerce Board**

Rebekah Bodkin, Edward Jones – Vice President • [rebekah.bodkin@edwardjones.com](mailto:rebekah.bodkin@edwardjones.com)  
Tammy Cunningham, Eide Bailly – Treasurer • [tcunningham@eidebailly.com](mailto:tcunningham@eidebailly.com)  
Mary Jane Buerkle, The Haskell Drug Store – Board Member • [maryjane@haskelldrugstore.com](mailto:maryjane@haskelldrugstore.com)  
Jacob Akins, First Bank Texas – Board Member  
Maggie Fouts, The Fouts Law Firm – Board Member  
Lonnie Hise, Haskell CISD – Board Member  
Chase Gibson – First Bank Texas – Board Member
